verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> also said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul אֹתִ֨י <S%H853><s%> שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לִמְשָׁחֳךָ֣ <S%H4886><s%> me to anoint לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee [to be] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> over his people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now שְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> now therefore hearken לְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> thou unto the voice דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the words יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פָּקַ֕דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> I remember אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> did עֲמָלֵ֖ק <S%H6002><s%> [that] which Amalek לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> to Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> how שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> how he laid לוֹ֙ בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [wait] for him in the way בַּעֲלֹת֖וֹ <S%H5927><s%> when he came up מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt

עַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> Now לֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וְהִכִּֽיתָ֜ה <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֗ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek וְהַֽחֲרַמְתֶּם֙ <S%H2763><s%> and utterly destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תַחְמֹ֖ל <S%H2550><s%> all that they have and spare עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> but וְהֵמַתָּ֞ה <S%H4191><s%> them not but slay מֵאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> both man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> and woman מֵֽעֹלֵל֙ <S%H5768><s%> infant וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יוֹנֵ֔ק <S%H3243><s%> and suckling מִשּׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ox וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> and sheep מִגָּמָ֖ל <S%H1581><s%> camel וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> and ass ס

וַיְשַׁמַּ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> together שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַֽיִּפְקְדֵם֙ <S%H6485><s%> and numbered בַּטְּלָאִ֔ים <S%H2923><s%> them in Telaim מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7273><s%> footmen וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> to a city עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> of Amalek וַיָּ֖רֶב <S%H7378><s%> adversary בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> in the valley

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקֵּינִ֡י <S%H7017><s%> unto the Kenites לְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go סֻּ֨רוּ <S%H5493><s%> depart רְד֜וּ <S%H3381><s%> get you down מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among עֲמָלֵקִ֗י <S%H6003><s%> the Amalekites פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not אֹֽסִפְךָ֙ <S%H622><s%> lest I destroy עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you עָשִׂ֤יתָה <S%H6213><s%> you with them for ye shewed חֶ֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּעֲלוֹתָ֖ם <S%H5927><s%> when they came up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַיָּ֥סַר <S%H5493><s%> departed קֵינִ֖י <S%H7017><s%> So the Kenites מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among עֲמָלֵֽק׃ <S%H6002><s%> the Amalekites

וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> the Amalekites מֵֽחֲוִילָה֙ <S%H2341><s%> from Havilah בּוֹאֲךָ֣ <S%H935><s%> [until] thou comest שׁ֔וּר <S%H7793><s%> to Shur אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] over against מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

וַיִּתְפֹּ֛שׂ <S%H8610><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲגַ֥ג <S%H90><s%> Agag מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֲמָלֵ֖ק <S%H6002><s%> of the Amalekites חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> alive וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people הֶחֱרִ֥ים <S%H2763><s%> and utterly destroyed לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

וַיַּחְמֹל֩ <S%H2550><s%> spared שָׁא֨וּל <S%H7586><s%> But Saul וְהָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲגָ֗ג <S%H90><s%> Agag וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֵיטַ֣ב <S%H4315><s%> and the best הַצֹּאן֩ <S%H6629><s%> of the sheep וְהַבָּקָ֨ר <S%H1241><s%> and of the oxen וְהַמִּשְׁנִ֤ים <S%H4932><s%> and of the fatlings וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַכָּרִים֙ <S%H3733><s%> and the lambs וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַטּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and all [that was] good וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and were not אָב֖וּ <S%H14><s%> and would הַחֲרִימָ֑ם <S%H2763><s%> not utterly destroy וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמְּלָאכָ֛ה <S%H4399><s%> them but every thing נְמִבְזָ֥ה <S%H959><s%> despised וְנָמֵ֖ס <S%H4549><s%> and refuse אֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> הֶחֱרִֽימוּ׃ <S%H2763><s%> that they destroyed utterly פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נִחַ֗מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> It repenteth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִמְלַ֤כְתִּי <S%H4427><s%> me that I have set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [to be] king כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> for he is turned back מֵאַֽחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> from following וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> my commandments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הֵקִ֑ים <S%H6965><s%> me and hath not performed וַיִּ֙חַר֙ <S%H2734><s%> And it grieved לִשְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel וַיִּזְעַ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> and he cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> all night

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֧ם <S%H7925><s%> rose early שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> And when Samuel לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7122><s%> to meet שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיֻּגַּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> it was told לִשְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> came שָׁא֤וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul הַכַּרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <S%H3760><s%> to Carmel וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מַצִּ֥יב <S%H5324><s%> and behold he set him up לוֹ֙ יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> a place וַיִּסֹּב֙ <S%H5437><s%> and is gone about וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed on וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and gone down הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> unto him Blessed אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> are you לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] thou of the LORD הֲקִימֹ֖תִי <S%H6965><s%> I have performed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the commandment יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel וּמֶ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> What קֽוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> What [meaneth] then this bleating הַצֹּ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> of the sheep הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this בְּאָזְנָ֑י <S%H241><s%> in mine ears וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the lowing הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> of the oxen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> which I hear

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul מֵעֲמָלֵקִ֣י <S%H6003><s%> them from the Amalekites הֱבִיא֗וּם <S%H935><s%> They have brought אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after חָמַ֤ל <S%H2550><s%> spared הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> for the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֵיטַ֤ב <S%H4315><s%> the best הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> of the sheep וְהַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> and of the oxen לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of זְבֹ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּוֹתֵ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> and the rest הֶחֱרַֽמְנוּ׃ <S%H2763><s%> we have utterly destroyed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> Then Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul הֶ֚רֶף <S%H7503><s%> Stay וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> and I will tell לְּךָ֔ אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> thee what the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> to me this night [וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ק) ל֖וֹ דַּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> unto him Say on ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though קָטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> When thou [wast] little אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> your own בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine own sight רֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [wast] thou not [made] the head שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וַיִּמְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <S%H4886><s%> anointed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּשְׁלָחֲךָ֥ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּדָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee on a journey וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְהַחֲרַמְתָּ֞ה <S%H2763><s%> and utterly destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחַטָּאִים֙ <S%H2400><s%> the sinners אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> the Amalekites וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֣ <S%H3898><s%> and fight ב֔וֹ עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתָ֖ם <S%H3615><s%> against them until they be consumed אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> Wherefore then didst thou not obey בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתַּ֙עַט֙ <S%H5860><s%> but didst fly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon הַשָּׁלָ֔ל <S%H7998><s%> upon the spoil וַתַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and didst הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> Yea I have obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD וָאָבִ֗יא <S%H935><s%> me and have brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲגַג֙ <S%H90><s%> Agag מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> of Amalek וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֖ק <S%H6002><s%> the Amalekites הֶחֱרַֽמְתִּי׃ <S%H2763><s%> and have utterly destroyed
